member.name: M:DataTableRetriever.Retriever.GetData(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Method for retrieving data for use in a jquery datatable. Uses Select with Offset and fetch to return a range of data for a page that varies by the specified page size and selected page. Also handles sorting by column and direction as well as a search term.
member.param: Paging parameter indicating where to begin pulling data
Paging parameter for number of records to return for page size
Which column is used as the sorting column
The direction to sort the selected column
The search term, returns records with a column containing the search value.
member.returns: An instance of a Result object that contains an enumerable of results, an integer of the total size of the search result, and an integer of the draw.
